name: Project: StarShip [Pre-Pre Alpha]
description:
Project: StarShip is a prototype project. Born out of learning everything I can about game development!

What you will play does not reflect the final finished version of the game and will be updated every week.

I have some updates soon to come for this game, now go kill some aliens!

Special Thanks to @heartbeast for providing such an amazing tutorial on how to make a topdown space shooter. I will continue to develop this above is foundation and make it its own! Thank you again and hope you enjoy playing as much as i enjoyed making it!

[CONTROLS]
Right click mouse to move

"S" to shoot
